segments.text: It's almost comical how unaware the woman is of her surroundings.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s drying that plate as if it’s the most important task in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the children are plotting a heist right behind her back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she can hear the muffled giggles of the boy as he reaches for the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but smile at their innocent mischief, even if it's risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their little teamwork is almost charming, the way they are cooperating in this secret.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then the reality hits me, and I feel a tinge of sadness for the inevitable crash that awaits.
segments.speaker: PAR
